headline: U.S. Futures Fall, Global Markets Mixed; Bitcoin Recovers Slightly
summary: Futures fell, breaking a five-day winning streak, and the dollar stayed weak after a selloff in cryptocurrencies in the prior session.

headline: Heard on the Street Recap Monday: Crypto Blues
summary: Confidence in crypto is melting. Bitcoin fell 6.4%, its largest daily decrease since March 3, according to Dow Jones Market Data. The decline knocked shares of crypto-focused companies, including Coinbase, Robinhood and Strategy.

content.title: Heard on the Street Recap Monday: Crypto Blues

headline: Bitcoin Rebounds Off Lows, Hitting $90,000
summary: Bitcoin rallied mid-morning in New York, bouncing back to $90,000 after suffering its worst day since March on Monday.  Crypto-sensitive stocks, including Strategy, Robinhood and Coinbase, also rose Tuesday.

headline: Robinhood CEO Says Gen Z Is Obsessed With 'Grandparent' Products Like Cassette Tapes And Walkmans—And Now They're Opening Retirement Accounts At 19
summary: There was a time when retirement accounts were something you opened in your 30s, maybe after buying a house or having kids. But according to Robinhood co-founder and CEO Vlad Tenev, that timeline may already be outdated. The generation known more for side hustles, digital wallets, and instant everything is now opening Roth IRAs at 19—and not because anyone told them to. Tenev recently appeared on the "Uncapped with Jack Altman" podcast, where he described what he called "a broader trend of thing

headline: Bitcoin Rebounds Off Lows, Rising Above $90,000
summary: Bitcoin rallied in New York Tuesday, bouncing back above $90,000 after suffering its worst day since March on Monday.  Bitcoin was recently up about 7% on the day. Crypto-sensitive stocks, including Strategy, Robinhood and Coinbase, also rose.

content.title: Bitcoin Rebounds Off Lows, Rising Above $90,000
content.summary: Bitcoin rallied in New York Tuesday, bouncing back above $90,000 after suffering its worst day since March on Monday.  Bitcoin was recently up about 7% on the day. Crypto-sensitive stocks, including Strategy, Robinhood and Coinbase, also rose.
